snippet: Kyrie Irving scored 33 points and made a key steal in the closing seconds, leading the Cavaliers — without a resting LeBron James — to a 99-98 win over the Dallas Mavericks in Cleveland.
abstract: Cleveland Cavaliers beat Dallas Mavericks, 99-98; other pro basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Kyrie Irving scored 33 points and made a key steal in the closing seconds, leading the Cavaliers — without a resting LeBron James — to a 99-98 win over the Dallas Mavericks in Cleveland.
